txt.en: You should clear all the goblins and wargs from Pinnath Fenui to ensure none attack you from behind while you confront their leader at the top of the camp.
Talk to Celeblír in Pinnath Fenui
A lone goblin stands at the top of the camp
'Looks like we're the welcoming committee again, boys!'
'Well, I hope you're happy! There's no one here! It's just me!'
'You're looking for the halfling?'
'Look for three rocks in a line, on the edge of this pool.'
'He's not here!'
'The spare key is buried beside the rock in that line nearest to the gate.'
'We're just letting goblins go, now?'
'He should have been! My boys caught him fair and square!'
Defeat all the goblins and wargs in Pinnath Fenui before confronting their leader at the top of the camp
'[placeholder], what did you learn?'
The goblins must have taken Bilbo to the mountainside encampment of Pinnath Fenui.
'But Bauglám pulled rank, he did.'
'Took the halfling away to Goblin-town!'
'I can tell you something useful, if you let me live!'
Sorrog Crows-eye is not pleased.
'Are you going to kill me?'

You have a choice: either to slay Sorrog Crows-eye or to spare his life.

To spare him, ensure that you have him selected and then use the <rgb=#00FF00>No</rgb> emote.
To slay him... you know what to do.
Things have gone from bad to worse: Bilbo is not held captive in Pinnath Fenui, but in Goblin-town!
Celeblír has arrived, and waits to hear what you learned about Bilbo's whereabouts.
To be safe, you should first clear the rest of the camp
'Thank you, stranger, thank you!'
'You won't be sorry!'
With Pinnath Fenui cleared of enemies, it is now safe to confront its leader at the top
'Here's what I know: the location of a spare key for the gate into Goblin-town!'
'Outside the main entrance, there is a frigid pool.'
'Farewell, stranger! May I never see you again!'
Mission: The Further Adventures of Bilbo Baggins, Chapter 6
'Bilbo has been taken to Goblin-town? This is an unlucky turn, [placeholder]!\n\n'Goblin-town! I can hardly believe this ill fortune!'
Listen to Sorrog Crows-eye and learn what happened to Bilbo
Either kill Sorrog Crows-eye or spare him (select him and emote <rgb=#00FF00>/No</rgb>)
'DNT - Blah! SPARED'
Wait for Celeblír to arrive
'We cannot leave Bilbo in Goblin-town. We must do something!'
'DNT - Blah! SPARED'
'Bilbo has been taken to Goblin-town? This is an unlucky turn, [placeholder]!\n\n'Let us hope they show the same mercy to our hobbit that you showed that goblin!'
'We cannot leave Bilbo in Goblin-town. We must do something!'
